mapper.sql: PLATE_ID, PLATE_NAME, PLATE_CODE, USERNAME, ROLE_CODE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID
mapper.select:
select
distinct
'true' as QUERYID,
from ht_cust_plate_tb
order by ${orderByClause}
mapper.insert: insert into ht_cust_plate_tb (PLATE_ID, PLATE_NAME, PLATE_CODE, USERNAME, ROLE_CODE, OP_TYPE, CREATE_TIME, MODIFY_TIME, CREATOR_ID, MODIFIER_ID) values (#{plateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{plateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{plateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into ht_cust_plate_tb
PLATE_ID,
PLATE_NAME,
PLATE_CODE,
USERNAME,
ROLE_CODE,
OP_TYPE,
CREATE_TIME,
MODIFY_TIME,
CREATOR_ID,
MODIFIER_ID,

mapper.update:
update ht_cust_plate_tb
PLATE_ID = #{record.plateId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
PLATE_NAME = #{record.plateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATE_CODE = #{record.plateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_CODE = #{record.roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

update ht_cust_plate_tb set PLATE_ID = #{record.plateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, PLATE_NAME = #{record.plateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATE_CODE = #{record.plateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{record.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_CODE = #{record.roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{record.opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{record.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{record.modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{record.creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{record.modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update ht_cust_plate_tb
PLATE_NAME = #{plateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLATE_CODE = #{plateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR},
CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where PLATE_ID = #{plateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update ht_cust_plate_tb set PLATE_NAME = #{plateName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLATE_CODE = #{plateCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, USERNAME = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ROLE_CODE = #{roleCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, OP_TYPE = #{opType,jdbcType=CHAR}, CREATE_TIME = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, MODIFY_TIME = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATOR_ID = #{creatorId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MODIFIER_ID = #{modifierId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where PLATE_ID = #{plateId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM ht_cust_plate_tb
USERNAME =#{userName} AND ROLE_CODE=#{role} AND OP_TYPE!='D'
AND PLATE_NAME LIKE '%${blockName}%'
ORDER BY CREATE_TIME DESC
